In Swedish:

Att spelet krashar vid car setup menyn har inget med ULTIMAs release att göra detta är en bug som finns även i det officiella spelet.
Det är språk filerna som inte stämmer, spelet fungerar perfekt med den Polska add on patchen.

Och inte så många kan polska så...
Så vi får vänta på en fixad LNG fil på engelska innan vi kan njuta at detta spel.

Var glada att ni inte köpt spelet.

In English: 

The game can crash in car setup menu is a bug in the game not a fault in ULTIMAs release, there is a error in the language files. The game can only be played fully with the Polish Addon Patch.

And no too many of us know polish...
So we will have to wait for a FIX on the LNG files to be released.

Just be happy you didn't boght the game.

Problem: 
The following message is received when trying to start the game:

Fatal Error GraphicsSS_SetupRender Adapter has no modes.

Solution: 
You must ensure that you have one of the graphics cards listed as supported on the back of the box. 
The game will only work when using one of these cards. 
You should also note the text on the box stating that Colin McRae Rally 2005 will not work on GeForce 4 MX cards or laptops.

I've solved the crash problem!
You have to use the polish patch!    

**** But!! **** 

Before installing the polish patch, go to the "DATA" directory in colin2005 directory, and copy the "STRINGS" directory to somewhere. Now you can run the polish patch. After that, you have to copy the "STRINGS" dir, that you copied before, to the original place ("DATA" directory), and when you asked, you have to overwrite every file. Run the game now, and it will work, with english language, and no crashes!!!!

So you ask, what is the problem, with the ultima-dvd version? Well, there is something wrong in the font files. So the polish patch changes the fonts to a good version. Thats all pals!

Bye

Here is how it goes to fix the protection error problem:
1) Edit your Colin McRae Rally 2005 Windows shortcut (found on the desktop and/or the start menu) by right clicking on it and selecting properties.
2) In the target box, add NOVIDEO after the target entry, so the target looks like this

"C:Program FilesCodemastersColin McRae Rally 2005CMR5.exe" NOVIDEO

3) Click on OK or Apply and now try running the game again"

For fixing the car setup crash bug just download this fix and apply:
http://www.gameburnworld.com/gp/gamefixes/colinmcraerally2005.htm
